<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A RAII object that creates a temporary directory upon initialization and</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Creates a managed temporary directory.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// @param Name The name of the directory to create.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// @param Unique If true, the directory will be created using</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///               llvm::sys::fs::createUniqueDirectory.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/tempdir/#a3f25fef2d2bb1b2135cb46bc4d2611eb"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">explicit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/tempdir/#a3f25fef2d2bb1b2135cb46bc4d2611eb">TempDir</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Unique = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::error&#95;code EC;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Unique) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">      EC = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#abf677459f5137cfb49f6d81b27ea54a1">llvm::sys::fs::createUniqueDirectory</a>(Name, Path);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!EC) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Resolve any symlinks in the new directory.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">        std::string UnresolvedPath(Path.str());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">        EC = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a2363fbfbd0a348f5d81fc3d3223ecae3">llvm::sys::fs::real&#95;path</a>(UnresolvedPath, Path);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">      Path = Name;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">      EC = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a8ba6f296474de05208b3e1cffe779120">llvm::sys::fs::create&#95;directory</a>(Path);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (EC)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">      Path.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">    EXPECT&#95;FALSE(EC) &lt;&lt; EC.message();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A RAII object that creates a file upon initialization and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="comment">/// removes it upon destruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/tempfile"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/tempfile/#a2277a37b366e2d68164f1ab32bb26dca">TempFile</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring">SmallString&lt;128&gt;</a> Path;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Creates a managed file.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// @param Name The name of the file to create.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// @param Contents The string to write to the file.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// @param Unique If true, the file will be created using</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///               llvm::sys::fs::createTemporaryFile.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/tempfile/#a2277a37b366e2d68164f1ab32bb26dca"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/tempfile/#a2277a37b366e2d68164f1ab32bb26dca">TempFile</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Suffix = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Contents = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Unique = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::error&#95;code EC;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> fd;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Unique) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal">      EC = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#ab15b20ec21b28d9674608fd5aecc64de">llvm::sys::fs::createTemporaryFile</a>(Name, Suffix, fd, Path);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">      Path = Name;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Suffix.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">        Path.append(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal">        Path.append(Suffix);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">      EC = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#aaa20e3a6a1473b383695503e0b5eb871">llvm::sys::fs::openFileForWrite</a>(Path, fd);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">    EXPECT&#95;FALSE(EC);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream">raw&#95;fd&#95;ostream</a> OS(fd, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;shouldClose&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal">    OS &lt;&lt; Contents;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal">    OS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a520bdf57dfe3e73abb53d482893f0a27">flush</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="normal">    EXPECT&#95;FALSE(OS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream/#a215c95ed69aa5b5756dd9c0f1b1de410">error</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (EC || OS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream/#a215c95ed69aa5b5756dd9c0f1b1de410">error</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal">      Path.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/tempfile/#a95d77439fae8ae67b4149394e6662a6e"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/tempfile/#a95d77439fae8ae67b4149394e6662a6e">~TempFile</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
